headline: International Paper Company (IP) to Shut Down Five UK Locations, Cut 300 Jobs
summary: International Paper Company (NYSE:IP) has announced plans to close five of its UK facilities, putting roughly 300 jobs at risk. The decision comes shortly after its £5.8 billion acquisition of UK-based competitor DS Smith and amid a challenging business climate. With a global workforce of around 65,000 across more than 30 countries, International Paper Company […]
